盤.definition: tray; plate; dish; (finance) (bound form) market prices; (computing) (bound form) disk; to coil (a rope, pigtail etc); to check; to examine; to investigate; to transfer; to sell (property); to shift; to move (sth big and heavy); classifier for things resembling a plate or dish; classifier for coils; classifier for games or matches (chess, table tennis etc)

盤古.definition: Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)

盤古氏.definition: Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)

盤問.definition: to interrogate; to cross-examine; to inquire

盤坐.definition: to sit cross-legged (as in the lotus position)

盤尾樹鵲.definition: (bird species of China) racket-tailed treepie (Crypsirina temia)

盤山縣.definition: Panshan county in Panjin 盤錦|盘锦, Liaoning

盤底.definition: to interrogate and get to the bottom of sth

盤店.definition: to buy a business (shop, restaurant etc) and all its assets; to sell a business (shop, restaurant etc) and all its assets

盤弄.definition: to play around with; to fidget; to fondle

盤據.definition: variant of 盤踞|盘踞[pan2 ju4]

盤旋.definition: to spiral; to circle; to go around; to hover; to orbit

盤旋曲折.definition: (idiom) (of a road etc) to wind circuitously

盤杠子.definition: to carry out gymnastic tricks on horizontal bar

盤查.definition: to interrogate; to question (at a roadblock)

盤根問底.definition: lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth

盤根究底.definition: lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth

盤根錯節.definition: twisted roots and intertwined joints (idiom); complicated and very tricky; knotty and deeply-rooted difficulties

盤桓.definition: to pace; to linger; to stay over; to spiral; to hover

盤秤.definition: balance consisting of steelyard with a pan; CL:臺|台[tai2]

盤符.definition: drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)

盤算.definition: to plot; to scheme; to calculate

盤繞.definition: to coil (around sth); to twine; to weave (basketwork)

盤纏.definition: money for a voyage; travel expenses

盤腿.definition: to sit cross-legged; to sit in the lotus position

盤貨.definition: to take stock; to make an inventory

盤踞.definition: to occupy illegally; to seize (territory); to entrench (oneself)

盤錦.definition: see 盤錦市|盘锦市[Pan2jin3 Shi4]

盤錦市.definition: Panjin, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

盤錯.definition: intertwined (of tree roots or branches); fig. an intricate matter

盤頭.definition: to coil hair into a bun; hair worn in bun; turban; hair ornament; to interrogate

盤飧.definition: dishes; the food in a dish

盤駁.definition: to cross-examine; to interrogate and refute

盤點.definition: to make an inventory; to take stock

盤龍.definition: Panlong district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan

盤龍區.definition: Panlong district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan

盤龍臥虎.definition: lit. coiled dragon, crouching tiger (idiom); fig. talented individuals in hiding; concealed talent
